entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:09 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:09 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17 with temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 17 with temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 10:09 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023
